scripts.deploy:kovan: graph deploy balancer-labs/balancer-kovan subgraph.kovan.yaml --debug --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy:ropsten: graph deploy balancer-labs/balancer-ropsten subgraph.ropsten.yaml --debug --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy:local: graph deploy balancer-labs/balancer-subgraph subgraph.yaml --debug --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020
